Events

Roll!
Voted Best Happy Hour
The best spot in town to savor an ice cold adult beverage. Enjoy discounted wells, house wine, beer, sangria, mojitos, margaritas, and mimosas during happy hour!
Monday:
All Day
Tuesday:
5pm-7pm
Wednesday-Friday:
4pm-7pm
We host live entertainment
Our local talents shine as they perform on the outside deck overlooking Lake Dora.
Thursday:
6pm-9pm
Friday:
7pm-10pm
Saturday:
7pm-10pm
Sunday:
12pm-3pm
weather permitting

Copyright© 2025 Pisces Rising Inc. All rights reserved.
Stay in Touch
Stay in the loop with everything Pisces Rising and Mount Dora by subscribing to our email club. Receive exclusive offers only available to our beloved members
Subscribe
We look Forward to seeing you!
Please note we do not take reservations for outside seating. Outside seating is on a first-come, first-serve basis. Reservations are for inside seating only. We will do our best to accommodate an outside seating preference if there is availability upon your arrival.
Holiday Hours:
Thanksgiving Day – Closed
Christmas Eve – Open
Christmas Day – Closed
New Year’s Eve – Open
New Year’s Day – Closed

.entry-header
Group dining
The perfect setting for Your event
Pisces Rising offers a large private room perfect for any event. The room can fit up to 40 people at multiple tables or up to 20 at one long table. We also have other semi-private rooms connected to the main room that can in total accommodate 80+ guests. We have hosted countless wedding rehearsal and reception dinners, graduation dinners, business meetings, anniversary parties, birthday parties, and other successful outings. We are also able to offer the entire restaurant for certain occasions; no event is too large or too small!
View one of our Private Group menus that showcase a cost effective limited menu perfect for any gathering. We can also design a more personal menu specific for your needs, or you can order directly from our regular menu to keep your options open! Contact our Event Coordinator by email at
samanthag@piscesrisingdining.com
or by phone at 352-385-2669. We recommend completing an inquiry form below so we can gather preliminary questions about your event to get the booking process started.
Private Dining Menus
lunch
$
15+
per person
View the $15+ Menu
$15+ Lunch Menu
Price per person
does not
include tax or gratuity
Turkey Sandwich
Turkey, Arugula, Tomato, Bacon, Swiss Cheese, Cranberry Aioli on a House Made Pretzel Panini Bread
Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
Grilled Chicken Breast, Romaine Lettuce, creamy Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese
Brisket
and Biscuit
House Smoked Brisket, BBQ Sauce, Coleslaw, Pickles, and Beer Cheese Sauce all piled on a House made Buttermilk Biscuit
Smoked Chicken Sandwich
Shredded House Smoked Chicken a Pretzel Bun with Spring Mix, Tomato, Red Onion, Apricot Aioli, Bacon and Swiss Cheese
dinner
$
30+
per person
View the $30+ Menu
$30+ Dinner Menu

does not
include tax or gratuity
SALAD COURSE
Signature Salad
Spring Mix, Carrots, Cucumber, Onion, and Tomatoes with our House Vinaigrette
ENTRÉE CHOICES

Rice and Grilled Zucchini and Squash
Chicken
Two Chicken Breast with a Citrus Beurre Blanc served with Mashed Potatoes and Green Beans
Pork Loin
Served with Mashed Potatoes and Green Beans
Mushroom Ravioli
Porcini Mushroom Ravioli locally made by Massimo’s Artisan Pasta in Orlando, in a Mushroom Cream Sauce

About Us
Careers
.entry-header
About Us
Our story
Pisces Rising was established in 2003 by the Winters family from Key West. What started as an old bungalow home built in 1919, transformed into the beautiful establishment it is today. Capturing the historic Mount Dora vibes, the original owners of the restaurant choose to keep the original 1919 home intact and made it the centerpiece of the restaurant. The original living room and dining room of the home is used as dining areas for small and large parties.
Enjoy outside dining on the deck or tiki bar overlooking Lake Dora and the setting sun. For a more intimate experience, dine inside surrounded by beautiful windows that offer a spectacular view of the lake.
The open kitchen is our “heart-of-the-house.” Our menu consists of Southern Florida dishes with a focus on utilizing fresh, local ingredients.
Hours of Operation
Monday, Wednesday, Thursday:
11:30AM-3:00PM / 5:00PM-9:00PM
Tuesday:
5:00PM-9:00PM
Friday & Saturday:
11:30AM-3:00PM / 5:00PM-10:00PM
Sunday:
11:00AM-3:00 PM / 5:00PM-9:00PM
Happy Hour
Voted Best Happy Hour in Mount Dora Buzz’s Best of Mount Dora poll!
Monday: ALL DAY
Tuesday: 5PM-7PM
Wednesday-Friday: 4PM-7PM
Our Core Values
Our service mission is to deliver hospitality with grace, warmth, and compassion. Our culinary mission is to execute fresh, distinctive takes on modern cuisine with homage to the culture that make up today’s traditions.
Integrity
Respect
Responsibility
Consistency
Community
Initiative
Trust
Collaboration
Impact
Legacy
239 W 4th Avenue, Mount Dora, FL 32757
352-385-2669
info@piscesrisingdining.com
